mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM(ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_PATH, HEAD_COUNT, PRICE, CAFE_ID) VALUES (ROOM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{description}, #{imagePath}, #{headCount}, #{price}, #{cafeId})
